  • Latest Projects

  • 3D Skeleton Reconstruction from Biplanar Radiographs

    • Convolutionnal Neural Nets
    • Stereovision
    • 3D Mesh Modeling
    15 Sep 2019

    Initially, the reconstruction relied on a single algorithm that detected the center of the spine vertebrae and inferred a 3D spine mesh with statistical shape model. Today, it has become much more complex and bigger project. Joint endeavours from the whole IA team and the LIO doctoral students have shaped a new reconstruction algorithm.

  • Artificial Intelligence in Zero Sum Games

    • AI
    • Monte Carlo Search
    • Game Theory
    • AlphaGo
    20 Mar 2018

    An agent is trained to play a two players board game with complete information such as Tic-Tac-Toe, Othello or Go. Given the rules of the game, the algorithm behind the agent will have to train only through self-play without any human knowledge. This work is based on AlphaZero’s algorithm, DeepMind’s latest breakthrough in the field.
